name: haptic
tagline: A self-hosted music server for streaming and organizing audio libraries
description: Haptic is a self-hosted music server for managing your audio library with a clean UI, playlists, and metadata views. It supports browser streaming and offline mode via PWA integration.

features.title: Status Page
features.description: Display service status information on a public page

features.title: Incident Reporting
features.description: Publish incident updates and service disruptions

features.title: Component Status Tracking
features.description: Track operational status of individual components

features.title: Timeline View
features.description: Show historical incidents and status changes

features.title: Custom Branding
features.description: Customize appearance of the status page

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the status page on your own servers
